casebody.data:
Ream et al., Appellants, v. MacPherson et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Ream v. MacPherson (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 304.]

No. 85-1237 Decided December 22, 1986. Gordon K. Bolon, Ellen L. Wristen and David A. Ucker, for appellants. Vorys, Sater, Seymour & Pease, Alan T. Radnor and J. Scott Jamieson, for appellees.

The judgment of the court of appeals in case No. 9-84-23, pursuant to appellants’ Proposition of Law No. 1, is hereby reversed on authority of Mominee v. Scherbarth (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 270, and the cause is remanded.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
